summary: A Vienna based acting couple make magic when they perform together on stage. Unknown to the theater going public and despite being married for only six months, that magic seems no longer to... See full summary »
cast: Alfred Lunt|Lynn Fontanne|Roland Young|Zasu Pitts|Maude Eburne|Herman Bing|Ann Dvorak|Geraldine Dvorak|Michael Mark|Eric Mayne
title: Sólo ella lo sabe
